api-error-messages.bad-request-error: The data entered was not in the correct format.
api-error-messages.gateway-timeout-error: The service is being slow. Please try again later.
api-error-messages.internal-server-error: An error occurred, our teams are working on finding a solution. Please try again later.
api-error-messages.login-unauthorized-error: There was an error in the email address or username/password entered.
api-error-messages.login-user-blocked-error: Your account has reached the maximum number of failed login attempts and has been temporarily blocked. Please '<'a href="{url}"'>'contact us'' to unblock it.
api-error-messages.login-user-temporary-blocked-error: You have reached too many failed login attempts. Please try again later or '<'a href="{url}"'>'reset your password here''.

swap-campaign-codes.title: Switch campaign codes
swap-campaign-codes.description: Allow to switch campaign codes from two different campaigns. Campaigns must be on the same organization.

error.mismatch-organization: Campaign code swapping is possible between campaigns on the same organization.
error.swap-code-error: May be one of your campaign id doesn't exist. Check and retry.

update-campaign-code.title: Update campaign code
update-campaign-code.description: Allow to modify the campaign code from the campaign ID. The campaign's code must be unique and composed of 9 uppercase alphanumeric characters.

error.campaign-code-format: Campaign's code should contains only uppercase alpha numeric characters.
